name: wtc-math
description: A math library that provides discrete components for common math operations. Includes vectors, matrices and quaternions.

scripts.prepare: npm run build && npx webpack --config webpack.config.js && npm run document
scripts.document: npx jsdoc -c jsdoc.json && npx doxdox src/ --layout markdown --output README.md

author: Liam Egan <liam@wethecollective.com>
